summary.title: Executive summary
summary.subtitle: Predicted revenue and confidence for the upcoming periods.
summary.empty: Connect your treatment and billing data to generate predictions.

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.subtitle: Services that are driving performance right now.
highlights.empty: Collect treatment data to surface top performers.
highlights.frequency: {count, plural, one {# treatment run} other {# treatments run}}

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.subtitle: Services that are losing traction and require attention.
alerts.empty: No declining services detected this period.
alerts.message: Review pricing, bundles or marketing to recover momentum.

marketing.noData: There is no marketing data yet. Add campaigns to start tracking results.

campaigns.title: Highlighted campaigns
campaigns.empty: Log your campaigns to analyse performance.

patientInsights.title: Acquisition indicators
patientInsights.acquisitionHint: People acquired during the last 30 days.
patientInsights.retentionHint: Percentage of patients returning for additional treatments.
patientInsights.lifetimeValueHint: Average revenue generated by each patient through their relationship with the clinic.
patientInsights.footer: Use these indicators alongside your campaigns to optimise marketing spend.

channels.title: Channel distribution
channels.subtitle: Patients reached per platform across all campaigns.
channels.empty: No patients have been attributed to your campaigns yet.

dormant.title: Campaigns without patients
dormant.subtitle: Keep an eye on active campaigns that are not delivering results yet.
dormant.empty: All campaigns have at least one patient.
dormant.hint: Consider adjusting messaging, budget or channel targeting to reactivate these campaigns.
